summary.p1: Caffeine and music alchemist, turning beverages and tunes into web applications. I have a soft spot for the xERN stack, transforming designs into responsive webs. I'm fluent in HTML5, CSS3, and (Java|Type)Script.
summary.p2: I'm not just a one-trick pony. While I'm more focused on FrontEnd, I also have a blast developing primarily with Node.js, but I'm learning GoLang and have experience with other technologies too.
summary.p3: I do love staying up-to-date with the latest trends, and my commitment is to deliver solutions that can be improved and maintained without suffering pain (if possible).
